body:
Hello all, TheKeyCrafter here. I know where I should place my ban appeal. However, I think I have been falsely banned. I just got banned, I think by 1Theodore1.

Eariler in Nebula, I met him. I admitted to him that something was wrong, I had no knockback. He said it was a glitch. I find it strange because after the server restarted and we move on to senex 2. After about 10 minutes of play time there, I was banned. Reason, Anti-Knockback and forcefield. This makes me really sad.

Is there any evidence to my ban
body_tagged:

title: Possibly falsely banned?

replies.body: Uh...if you told him you werent receiving kncokback and he said it wa  a glitch, u shouldnt have been banned.
replies.body_tagged: Uh...if you told him you werent receiving kncokback and he said it wa  a glitch, u shouldnt have been banned.

replies.body:
Yes, I actually have video edivence of you hacking.
And with this glitch you do get some knockback, just sometimes you dont take. You would take 0% knockback and you were using blatant aimbot / forcefield. I will render and upload the video and I'll show you.
replies.body_tagged:
Yes, I actually have video edivence of you hacking.
And with this glitch you do get some knockback, just sometimes you dont take. You would take 0% knockback and you were using blatant aimbot / forcefield. I will render and upload the video and I'll show you.

replies.body:
If he said it was a glitch he shouldn't be banning you o.e unless there is a secret code that only staff know to find out hackers... my last option is he invited another mod and they checked it together and they both decided that you were hacking.
until then mssg a manager or above on skype or appeal to the email

replies.body: I already explained that with the specified glitch, in some hits you take no knockback, and in some hits you get knockback. I spectated him for about 10-15 minutes and he did not take knockback, at all. I did not record all the time while I was spectating, though.
replies.body_tagged: I already explained that with the specified glitch, in some hits you take no knockback, and in some hits you get knockback. I spectated him for about 10-15 minutes and he did not take knockback, at all. I did not record all the time while I was spectating, though.

That's really sucks-- you seem really cool and I'd like to see you in the community more D:
I'd like to see the video evidence as soon as possible.

I-I am I just can't, you were.. you were such a nice person
what happened dude... ; - ;

replies.body: ..... You were hacking and then posted a topic that said you were falsely banned? Then on top of that you posted the link and said it's true... Well I'm kinda disapointed but you can always try to appeal at support@avicus.net
replies.body_tagged: ..... You were hacking and then posted a topic that said you were falsely banned? Then on top of that you posted the link and said it's true... Well I'm kinda disapointed but you can always try to appeal at support@avicus.net

replies.body: He said he was falsely banned because he wanted a tiny chance, even though it might be none, of being un-banned. I'm personally happy that he admitted to hacking because that's the nicest thing to do. Although he lied, when he knew it was over, he admitted he was doing something wrong instead of refusing to admit it due to their pride. You're the best hacker ever, Key <3

Appeal by sending an email at support@avicus.net. 
Good luck.
